metadata.topic: The world would be a better place if everybody obtained their news from at least two sources - one left-wing, and one right-wing.

moderator_initial_opinion:
I am Neutral or Undecided.

This statement highlights the importance of diverse perspectives and sources in shaping our understanding of the world, but it oversimplifies the complexities of news consumption and the nuances of left-wing and right-wing ideologies. A more nuanced approach would involve considering multiple sources across various ideological spectrums, rather than relying on a binary left-right dichotomy.
